alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 7:54PM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds gusting up to 65 mph. Significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous crosswinds will make travel difficult for high profile vehicles and those towing trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds combined with fresh snow will create areas of blowing snow, reducing visibility below a mile at times. Drifting snow will keep roadways slick and will make travel on rural roads difficult into Friday afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
